handNote.p: This hand also writes 2v, 3r–11v, 34rv and 35r/4–61v. There is an edge decoration in the lower margins of 40v–52v.
A revising hand in red-brown ink making very few revisions. There are further overwritings by Junius, as elsewhere in the MS, which are marked as uncertain.
